subject: p19759491
Findings: Sternal wires, valve prosthesis, cardiac device, and mild cardiomegaly are unchanged. There is new left lower lobe infiltrate and small left effusion. There is also a small right effusion.
Impression: New left lower lobe infiltrate and effusion.
